name: Butcher Tale (Game Mockup Jam)
description:
Dana is an orc butcher. She always dreamt to start adventuring but she quickly realized that is not a very profitable career. She decided then to let her boyfriend Siegfrin to live the dream, by taking a boring but secure job to allow him to go on adventures instead.

But in the month of April 2023, Siegfrin has been missing. Three weeks have passed and he hadn't called once since he started a new mission for the local guild.
Dana gets scared and she is trying to understand if something happened to him or that he might have decided to ditch her for somebody else, maybe even that vain collegue he had, Bradamania.

Follow Dana in her quest of finding her loved one, beat the crap of some enemy through some turn based RPG elements and find a true new meaning of life!

Or don't cause this is just a mockup lol
